column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Fun environment and surprisingly large restaurant
column2: have been here a few times always busy but not overwhelming. Definitely recommend reservations on weekends as the wait can be lengthy
column3: but if you are just a couple
column4: there are two bars which you can typically slide right into and eat at the bar. The tapas are very filling(which isn't always the case with tapas) and priced reasonably
column5: I always plan on getting the paella but end up too full from tapas! Â and I'm always a fan of a place that offers wine flights- the sangria is amazing too! Also close to other bars if you do have a wait!
